original_text: Therefore have I hewed them by the prophets; I have slain them by the words of my mouth: and thy judgments are as the light that goeth forth.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 선지자들로 그들을 치고 내 입의 말로 그들을 죽였노니 내 심판은 빛처럼 나오느니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore have I hewed them by prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 선지자들을 통해 그들을 베어버렸다

sentences.original_text: I have slain them by words of my mouth
and thy judgments are as light
